title: Cabrillo National Monument: Park Home
body: A Voyage of Discovery at Cabrillo National Monument  Climbing out of his boat and onto shore in 1542, Juan Rodriguez Cabrillo stepped into history as the first European to set foot on what is now the West Coast of the United States. In addition to telling the story of 16th century exploration, the park is home to a wealth of cultural and natural resources. Join us and embark on your own Voyage of Discovery.Â                  Low Tide in the Tidepools   Low tide in the tidepools at Cabrillo        Old Point Loma Lighthouse in Spring   The Old Point Loma Lighthouse with Spring Wildflowers        Cabrillo Statue at Cabrillo   Visitors at the Cabrillo statue at Cabrillo
